ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT gs.id, category_id, f.name, `img`, `price`, `cost`, `sale_price`, on_shelves, `state`, gs.stock_num, gs.sale_num, f.`update_time` FROM gs_goods gs INNER JOIN gs_item f ON gs.item_id=f.id INNER JOIN gs_category c ON f.category_id = c.id WHERE c.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ({state}<0 OR state={state}) AND ({cid}<0 OR f.category_id={cid}) AND ('{keyword}'='' OR f.name Like '%{keyword}%') /*AND ('{cost1}'='' OR cost */ ORDER BY f.update_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM gs_goods gs INNER JOIN gs_item f ON gs.item_id=f.id INNER JOIN gs_category c ON f.category_id = c.id WHERE c.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ({state}<0 OR state={state}) AND ({cid}<= 0 OR f.category_id={cid}) AND ('{keyword}'='' OR f.name Like '%{keyword}%') /*AND ('{cost1}'='' OR cost */
